font.a: Committee of the Whole Meeting Monday, April 27, 2020 @ 3:00 PM

br.span: The mission of West Harvey-Dixmoor School District #147 is to create a climate of excellence by empowering all students and stakeholders to attain their highest potential: academically, socially and personally.

The vision of the West Harvey-Dixmoor School District #147 is to create a positive learning environment in which to educate all students. Each student will achieve at a higher level of academic performance, as well as exhibit good personal character, while functioning effectively in the community and contributing to the broader society.

strong.font: Back to School All Star Welcome!!

div.span: West Harvey-Dixmoor School District 147 understands that students may need additional resources to supplement their learning experiences. We have compiled some resources for students to access. Click on the image above for more information.

West Harvey-Dixmoor School District 147 understands that parents are our students first teacher. We want to partner with parents to give you the tools needed to help your student be successful. Click on the image above for more information.
West Harvey-Dixmoor School District 147 is committed to the success of its faculty and staff. We have provided resources to help you along your professional journey. Click above for more information.

h2.font: West Harvey-Dixmoor School District 147 | 191 W 155th Pl. Harvey IL 60426
